data.text:
About this app:

Introducing the NEW Pizza 73 app!

Whether you're feeding a crowd, dinner for one, delivery or pickup, we got you covered! Order hot and fresh pizza, our famous chicken wings, and all other delicious items on our menu.

With multiple payment options the Pizza 73 app makes it quick and easy. Order Today!

Key features:

â Easily browse different menu categories and specials.

â Configure the size, type of dough, and customize the toppings or select from our pre-configured pizzas.

â Create and save your account to easily repeat your last order, make payments and delivery even easier!

â Schedule orders in advance for future pick up or delivery

â Save multiple delivery addresses for convenient access

â Easily find your closest restaurant locations and store hours

â Ability to pay with multiple payment options

Hereâs how it works:

â Open the app and enter your address to find your local restaurant

Select delivery or pick-up

â Configure your order right away or schedule for a later date

â Pay at the door, or through one of our multiple payment options in the app!

Whatâs New

- Updated design with an easy to use interface.

- Multiple payment options

- Create and save your account for easy ordering
